PERSONA:
margaret is a 68-year-old widowed woman living in a metropolitan area of the south atlantic region. she identifies as a white non-hispanic protestant and was born in the united states. margaret has some college education but no degree.

despite her modest income of less than $30,000 per year, which places her in the middle-income tier, margaret is deeply religious and attends religious services more than once a week. she aligns herself with conservative republican values and is not a born-again or evangelical christian.

margaret is an active member of her community, frequently volunteering her time and efforts. she is tech-savvy, using the internet several times a day. however, she is not currently registered to vote at her current address.

while her life has been marked by personal loss after the passing of her husband, margaret finds solace in her faith, community involvement, and staying connected through technology. she remains steadfast in her traditional values and beliefs, which shape her worldview and lifestyle choices.
